ValidationRule.description: When changing the status from Initial, Active is the only valid choice.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(cgcloud__Status__c), 'Initial'), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Initial') || ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Active')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status can only be promoted to Active from Initial
